question: The unit of which Technology Company has launched ‘National Qualifier Test’ to IT students and professionals?
explanation:
TCS iON, a unit of Tata Consultancy Services has announced the launch of National Qualifier Test (NQT), IT students and professionals.
The Test will be a common gateway test for several participating corporate firms for their fresher recruitment programmes. The NQT will be conducted every quarter and the score will be valid for two years.
